title: Cosmos co-founder says GovGen will show how governance can be used in blockchain development
description:
In November 2023, the Cosmos Hub community approved the contentious proposal 848, which reduced the maximum inflation rate of the native token ATOM to 10% from 20%. At the time, ATOM’s actual inflation rate stood at 14%. The proposal was expected to fall through. However, just before the deadline, there was a surge of votes […]

The post Cosmos co-founder says GovGen will show how governance can be used in blockchain development appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: Bitcoin’s Scalability Foreseen by Satoshi Nakamoto to Outpace Visa, Historic Email Reveals
description: This week, crypto enthusiasts and historians alike have found themselves enraptured by the wealth of newly released emails from Satoshi Nakamoto, uncovering the visionary’s early efforts with Bitcoin. Specifically, one email, identified as number #3, offers unparalleled glimpses into Nakamoto’s considerations regarding Bitcoin’s scalability, economic framework, and prospects. Emails Suggest Satoshi Nakamoto Was Quite Confident […]

title: Here’s Why New Phones Will Have AI Features
description: Mobile phones, once mere communication devices, are now becoming miniature AI powerhouses. The explosion of GenAI in 2023 has started a trend where almost every phone manufacturer is vying to introduce AI features. Samsung, Google, Major Phone Brands Set The AI Trend Last Month, Samsung released its Galaxy S24 smartphone lineup, which included three AI-powered […]
